issue.title: [CF 169] Dispel-Type Enrage Memory Usage
issue.body:
The memory usage of "Tell Me When Options" drastically increases for me as soon as I create an icon to watch for dispellable Enrage effects on my target or focus.

Memory usage without icon: Almost zero
Memory usage with icon: 4.1 mb

Im using the standard settings: Icon -> Buff/Debuffs -> Dispel Type Enrage


> Posted by CurseForge user xabbu76 | Imported from CurseForge issue #169 | Raw

comments.body:
Sorry, my observations were wrong. The increased memory usage is not related to the dispel enrage.

Actually memory usage of TellMeWhen options peaks as soon as you type /tmw and change an icon or move a bar etc.. After that the memory usage stays high, garbace collect has no influence on that.

Reloading the UI will decrease memory usage again.


> Posted by CurseForge user xabbu76

TellMeWhen_Options is just naturally high in memory usage now that I cache spells. This is why options are in a separate addon.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
